body.p: You may create generic comments or mark some document fragment as being inserted, deleted, or highlighted. The rendering in each of these cases will be different.
In the above image the commented sections are shown in yellow, the deleted content is in red.

To create annotations in your PDF document you should create a specific structure in your document. In the following you will see how this structure may look like for XML documents and HTML documents.

In case you want to style the change elements as plain elements in the content, using CSS rules, you can disable the annotation processing using the command line parameter: -noPDFAnnotationsForChangeTrackingAndComments.
